articles.title: Some Kaspersky customers receive surprise forced-update to new antivirus software - TechCrunch
articles.description: After U.S. ban, Kaspersky's American customers were automatically migrated to UltraAV antivirus, in some cases without the customers' knowledge.
articles.content: Customers of Kaspersky antivirus in the United States found out in the last few days that their cybersecurity software was automatically replaced with a new one called UltraAV, according to several c… [+3388 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk reveals ambitious SpaceX Starship plans for Mars missions - TESLARATI
articles.description: "While I have many concerns about a potential Kamala regime, my absolute showstopper is that the bureaucracy currently choking America to death is guaranteed to grow under a Democratic Party administration," Musk said.
articles.content:
Elon Musk revealed more details about SpaceX’s ambitious plans to send Starship to Mars in the coming years, an expansion on previous goals the CEO spoke about just a few weeks ago.
